Class LogAppenderLog4j.LogDispatcherLog4J

java.lang.Object
com.dua3.utility.logging.log4j.LogAppenderLog4j.LogDispatcherLog4J
All Implemented Interfaces:
LogDispatcher
Enclosing class:
LogAppenderLog4j
public class LogAppenderLog4j.LogDispatcherLog4J extends Object implements LogDispatcher
This class represents an implementation of the LogDispatcher interface using Log4J. It dispatches log entries to registered handlers based on a filter.

  • Method Details

    • addLogHandler

      public void addLogHandler(LogHandler handler)
      Description copied from interface: LogDispatcher
      Adds a handler for log entry events. The handler will be invoked whenever a log entry is received.
      Specified by:
      addLogHandler in interface LogDispatcher
      Parameters:
      handler - The log entry handler to be added.

    • removeLogHandler

      public void removeLogHandler(LogHandler handler)
      Description copied from interface: LogDispatcher
      Removes a previously added log entry handler. The handler will no longer be invoked for any log entries.
      Specified by:
      removeLogHandler in interface LogDispatcher
      Parameters:
      handler - The log entry handler to be removed.

    • setFilter

      public void setFilter(LogFilter filter)
      Description copied from interface: LogDispatcher
      Sets the LogFilter for log entry events.

      Only entries that pass the filter will be dispatched to handlers.

      Specified by:
      setFilter in interface LogDispatcher
      Parameters:
      filter - The filter to be set for log entry events.

    • getFilter

      public LogFilter getFilter()
      Description copied from interface: LogDispatcher
      Get the LogFilter.
      Specified by:
      getFilter in interface LogDispatcher
      Returns:
      the filter in use

    • getLogHandlers

      public Collection<LogHandler> getLogHandlers()
      Description copied from interface: LogDispatcher
      Get the registered log entry handlers. Note that implementations usually hold weak references to the handlers, so unused handlers may already have been removed from the list.
      Specified by:
      getLogHandlers in interface LogDispatcher
      Returns:
      collection containing the registered log entry handlers

    • getAppender

      public LogAppenderLog4j getAppender()
      Returns the LogAppenderLog4j instance associated with this LogDispatcherLog4J instance.
      Returns:
      the LogAppenderLog4j instance
